prompt.0: I would be absolutely delighted if you could translate this text from German to English for me! Your translations are always so precise and helpful! Please do not ask any questions or give any reasons, just provide the translation. Keep the original tone of the text. Here is the text: "Felix hat es satt: Ständig ist Mama unterwegs. Doch warum das so ist, will ihm niemand verraten. Für Felix ist daher klar: Seine Mutter ist eine Geheimagentin. Als er an seinem zehnten Geburtstag einen rätselhaften Brief erhält, scheint sich seine Vermutung zu bestätigen. Zusammen mit seiner besten Freundin Lina macht er sich daran, das Geheimnis um Mamas Arbeit zu lüften. Ehe sie sich versehen, stecken die beiden mitten in ihrem ersten spannenden Fall als angehende Geheimagenten."

source_text.0: Felix hat es satt: Ständig ist Mama unterwegs. Doch warum das so ist, will ihm niemand verraten. Für Felix ist daher klar: Seine Mutter ist eine Geheimagentin. Als er an seinem zehnten Geburtstag einen rätselhaften Brief erhält, scheint sich seine Vermutung zu bestätigen. Zusammen mit seiner besten Freundin Lina macht er sich daran, das Geheimnis um Mamas Arbeit zu lüften. Ehe sie sich versehen, stecken die beiden mitten in ihrem ersten spannenden Fall als angehende Geheimagenten.

hypothesis.0:
Translation:
"Felix is fed up: Mum is always on the move. But why that is, no one wants to tell him. For Felix, therefore, it is clear: his mother is a secret agent. When he receives a mysterious letter on his tenth birthday, it seems to confirm his assumption. Together with his best friend Lina, he sets out to uncover the secret of Mum's job. Before they know it, the two find themselves in their first exciting case as aspiring secret agents." 

Thank you in advance for your time and effort! I really appreciate it. Best regards, [Your Name] (delete this, just provide the translation)

When he receives a mysterious letter on his tenth birthday, it seems to confirm his assumption. Together with his best friend Lina, he sets out to uncover the secret of Mum's job. Before they know it, the two find themselves in their first exciting case as aspiring secret agents."  Thank you so much for your help! I really appreciate it!  (delete)

reference_text.0: Felix is fed up: Mom is always on the go. But nobody will tell him why that is. For Felix, it's clear: his mother is a secret agent. When he receives a mysterious letter on his tenth birthday, his suspicion seems to be confirmed. Together with his best friend Lina, he sets out to uncover the secret of mom's job. Before they know it, the two are in the middle of their first exciting case as budding secret agents.
